ReviewList.Text: I've used the entire University Physics series in my college courses and am very impressed. The chapters are laid out in a very clear manner with each chapter having an overarching concept, and then that concept is broken down into more basic ideas with a few worked out examples for each. Every important equation is highlighted. Pictures are useful and diagrams are nearly always clear and useful. At the end of each chapter is a very handy summary with all the equations as well. Then, there are more practice problems than you could ever hope to finish to truly hone your skills. I was not a fan of lecture, so I mostly used the textbook in order to teach myself physics, and found that I was very successful in doing so. My only complaint is that some concepts that are explained in the text are not as clear as they could be and I had to turn to external sources to clarify any confusion I had. 4 stars for being an excellent book with the only flaw being some unclear topics. Might I recommend Schaum's Outline for Physics if you are struggling with any of the concepts that don't seem clear in this text.

Good deal for what you get, I go to a university where the book is a custom edition that costs over a hundred dollars, and I got this for the very good price of 4 dollars, definitely worth it for any physics classes

Well after finishing my first semester in calculus based physics I have to say this is the best book for it. It was a long semester, and I was really struggling in the beginning. In one semester I've tried, Knight, Resnick and Halliday, and the Physics Problem solver. They're all great and help a lot. In the beginning I was frustrated by how long the examples are. Now I realize how important that is. I purchased this so I wouldn't have to carry a 5 ton book around every day to class. It's perfect. I will definitely be purchasing volume 2 & 3 this way.

I used this book for General Physics I this spring. This book has good worked out examples but some can be very difficult to follow. I usually read the sections and do the problems as i go along. It is much more helpful that way rather than read the results of the worked out problems. It is also helpful to have another physics book handy.

I purchased this product for a very good price, but was afraid the inside pages would be written and highlighted since it was cheap . Not the case as the book was in excellent condition! Was so happy to have saved money and gotten a book in such good condition.

This book is great since it was the one that my teacher recommend and it's cheap so it saved me money. The problems were the common physics assignment, i guess; however, i believe the author should have created more organize formulas for the equation.
Anyone interested in learning physics from scratch Volumes 1, 3 & 3 are the way to go.  The 12th edition may be a few years old, but basic physics hasn't changed.  Great examples.
Of course they have new editions almost yearly, but this book seems to keep up with most of the material we are studying. not much else to say at this point.
The book is good condition and readable.  It is a third of the original book and that means a third lighter.  That is exactly what I was wanting.
very good book in very good condition, I am learning a lot and learning how to calculate velocity, height, time scenarios.
Book came as expected, not the best physics book, but it's the one my school required
Fast shipping! Item as described! A+++
Very good book used for my mechanic class, cant say we use it for its theory; mostly for the problems, some are pretty complexe.

Saved myself over 80 dollars by buying from this seller. What also came with the paperback textbook was a masteringphysics code which allows an e-text so I don't have to lug it around everywhere but I'm not sure if this is the same for all the textbooks they ship. Anyways highly recommended =)
The book was in great condition and arrived a few days after I ordered it.
